summary: The customer was looking for information about Contoso Wireless products and was interested in purchasing a tablet. The customer service agent provided information about the two tablet models available, the Contoso Wireless Tablet Pro and the Contoso Wireless Tablet Max. The agent also informed the customer of the promotion they are currently running where customers can get 20% off when they sign up for their 12 month subscription plan, which includes unlimited access to apps and games, free software updates for one year, and access to exclusive discounts.
